meanings.definition: The quality or state of being thin or lean.
meanings.sent1: Her scrawniness made her look fragile.
meanings.sent2: The scrawniness of the stray cat was evident in its ribs showing.
meanings.sent3: Despite his scrawniness, he could eat a whole pizza by himself.
meanings.sent4: The scrawniness of the tree branches made them sway in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The scrawniness of the model's legs was exaggerated by the high heels.

meanings.sent1: The scrawniness of the branches made the tree look bare.
meanings.sent2: His scrawniness was due to his fast metabolism.
meanings.sent3: The scrawniness of the sandwich was comical next to the giant burger.
meanings.sent4: The scrawniness of the thread made it easy to break.
meanings.sent5: The scrawniness of the puppy made it adorable and delicate.
